text: How to Play Baseball is a cartoon produced by Walt Disney Productions and released by RKO Radio Pictures in September 1942, featuring Goofy. The short was produced at the request of Samuel Goldwyn and first shown to accompany the 1942 feature film The Pride of the Yankees. ==References== Category:1942 movies Category:Disney animated movies Category:Goofy Category:Short movies Category:Baseball movies
title: How to Play Baseball
